Some Lesser Known Facts About Avril Lavigne

Does Avril Lavigne smoke?: Yes

Does Avril Lavigne drink alcohol?: Yes

Avril never liked school and was kicked out a couple of times. She dropped out when she got a chance to record music with a record label.

She did not choose the formula of being bared skin to gain attention/popularity, instead, she wooed everyone with her powerful voice, strong melodies and straight-forward lyrics.

Her albums have been 6 x platinum (Let go), 3 x platinum (Under my Skin) and platinum (The Best Damn Thing).

She has been nominated eight times for the Grammy Awards.

Avril Lavigne, ladies and gentlemen, is self-taught!

She can play guitar, drums and piano.

Her second album, under my skin sold 8 million copies worldwide.

She has had multiple number one Billboard 100 Hot and her song “Girlfriend” had 7.3 million downloads and was the highest-selling song of 2007.

Other than her own songs, she has also co-writeen some songs with Kelly Clarkson, Demi Lovato and Leona Lewis.

She has also provided some songs for the movies like Eragon, Sweet Home Alabama, Bruce Almighty, Legally Blonde 2, The Princess Diaries 2, The House Bunny, and Alice in Wonderland.

She took-over the apparel and accessory brand, Abbey Dawn, and is successful with her entrepreneurship.

At the age of just 15 years, she already had the chance to share the stage with Shania Twain.

During her hiatus from music, she designed clothes, perfumes and acted in movies.

Lavigne gained her initial popularity because of her unique tom-boyish style.

Mostly she was seen wearing baggy clothes, Converses, wristbands and sometimes shoelaces wrapped around her fingers.

She accepts that she is weird and confessed that she does not want to change.

Her song Alice was nominated as the best song at the Oscars.

She also said that her songs are about her own personal experiences.

Avril was a dreamer and she said, “I remember as a child, lying on my bed singing and imagining as thousands of people were listening to me.”

In her video ‘Girlfriend’, the bassist is her brother Matt.

She is diagnosed with deficit Hyperactivity.

She is a vegetarian.

People admired the way she looked like an angel when she sang in the church.

She always puts on make up in her own privacy and by herself.
